pre_rescue.text:
Help! I'm trapped
under this rubble!

My leg's stuck... please help me
move the debris.

post_rescue.text:
I couldn't have made it
without your help.

level_2_briefing.text:
All units, this is Captain Nhoy from the Municipal Disaster Risk Reduction and Management
Operations Center.

A strong magnitude 6.7 earthquake has affected multiple barangays
in the municipality.
Ground shaking was recorded at approximately 09:42 AM.

Initial reports from the Barangay Committee indicate
structural damage.

Several houses have collapsed, fires have been reported,
and residents are injured.

Aftershocks are expected. All responders observe
standard safety protocols.

• Locate and rescue at least one trapped civilian in the
  affected barangay.
• Provide first aid by properly bandaging injured civilians.

• Transport stabilized victims to the evacuation center
  using a stretcher.

• Extinguish any active fires caused by structural damage
  or gas leaks.

During aftershocks, immediately perform duck, cover,
and hold procedures.

Stay alert for falling debris, unstable structures,
and damaged electrical lines.

Establish triage and treatment areas at designated
 evacuation centers.

This is a full activation of earthquake response protocols.
Prioritize life‑saving operations.

Operations Center standing by for updates.
Execute response immediately.

sandbox_welcome.text:
You are now in the training
sandbox environment.

This space is designed for practice,
experimentation, and mastery.

There is no time limit here.
No penalties. No mission failure.

Each chamber contains a specific
objective scenario from our disaster
response operations.

You may enter any chamber at any
time.

Inside, focus on completing
the objective as instructed.

Observe your environment carefully.
Use the correct tools. Apply proper
procedure.

Should you have any questions about the scenario or the tools at your
disposal, feel free to ask the assigned guide per objective.

Interact with them by aiming at them
and pressing the trigger on your right
controller.

If you wish to attempt the scenario
again, locate the reset button on the
chamber wall.

Pressing the reset button will restore
the chamber to its initial state.

You may repeat each objective as
many times as necessary.

Use this opportunity to refine your
technique and improve your response
time.

When you feel confident, proceed to
the full mission scenarios.

Training builds readiness.
Readiness saves lives.
You may begin whenever you are ready.

sandbox_repeat.text:
This is the training sandbox
environment.

You are free to enter any chamber
and practice its objective.

Interact with the assigned guide in each chamber using the trigger of the
right controller for instructions and tips on how to complete the objective.
There are no time limits or penalties here.
Focus on proper procedure and situational awareness.
If you want to retry a scenario, use the reset button inside the chamber.
You may repeat each objective as many times as needed.
Continue training until your actions become instinctive.

instructions.text: Warning, aftershock detected.
Immediately perform duck, cover, and hold.
Crouch down to reduce exposure.
Place both hands over your head for protection.
Hold your position until the ground shaking stops.
Stay alert and resume operations when safe.
Assist this injured civilian to the safe area.
Support the victim by grabbing their waist with one hand.
Use your other hand to hold the victim's raised arm.
Keep your hands close to these positions to support their movement.
Guide the civilian carefully toward the evacuation area.
Maintain steady assistance until the victim reaches safety.
Seems like a fire broke out.
Open your emergency kit and locate the fire extinguisher.
Pick up the fire extinguisher.
Aim at the base of the fire.
Press the trigger on your controller to discharge the extinguisher.
Continue spraying until the fire is fully extinguished.
Responder, the injured civilian must be transported to the evacuation area.
Locate the stretcher nearby.
Grab both stretcher handles by nholding them with your controllers.
Position the stretcher around the victim.
Lift the stretcher carefully.
Carry the victim to the designated safe area or evacuation zone.
Lower the stretcher to safely drop the victim at the evac area.
Responder, this victim needs immediate first aid.
Open your emergency kit by pressing the trigger on your left controller.
Locate the bandage inside the emergency kit and pick it up.
Find the wound on the injured victim.
While holding the bandage, perform a circling motion around the wound.
Continue wrapping until the wound is fully covered.
These doors are blocking your path.
Use the sledgehammer from your emergency kit to break it down.
Grab the sledgehammer and swing it at the door repeatedly.
Continue striking until the door breaks open.
Once the door is clear, proceed to the next objective.
This area is currently inaccessible.
Please proceed to the next available objective.
